/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, lined with lush green trees, stretches out into the distance, flanked by towering buildings that reach up towards the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape.
